summary:
Replaces the default pine trees with (in my opinion) a better one. 
If there is enough interest in this mod,  I will continue to edit and 
add trees, addons, plants, etc.     So please leave comments
and endorse if you like it.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://piclair.com/data/eccvj.jpg[/img]

Replaces the default pine trees with (in my opinion) a better one. 
If there is enough interest in this mod,  I will continue to edit and 
add trees, addons, plants, etc.     So please leave comments
and endorse if you like it.  


             [color=#717550]Upcoming changes:[/color] 
                  Improving the snow on the main and \"lesser\" snow pines.  
                  Possibly a 2048x set for the higher res modders.
                  Maybe some addons,  such as lichens.


             [b][color=#717550]v0.14[/color][/b]:	
	Added the \"cuts\" on the ends of the logs.  Tweaked the moss a bit more.
	Replaced the \"split\" insides of the logs at the mill. 
	New Images.


             [b][color=#717550]v0.13[/color][/b]:	
	Fixed a \"seam\" bug,  should be much more \"seamless\" now.


             [b][color=#717550]v0.12[/color][/b]:	
	Added more moss to the base of the pines


             [b][color=#717550]v0.1[/color][/b]:	
	Replaced Pine trees with and without snow.


[b][color=#717550]Install[/color][/b]:

	Copy and paste the textures folder that was compressed with this txt file to your
	\" .. Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data  \"
	folder.


[b][color=#717550]Credit[/color][/b]: 

	textures: goodtextures.com
	edit and design: [b][color=#FFFFFF]seg_x[/color][/b]

	you may noticed in the images that some of the landscape textures are also HD,
	that excellent mod would be found here:

	    [color=#717550]Serious HD Retexture Landscape Skyrim by Z4G4[/color]
	http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146
author: Segx
